idea:
An Innovative 5 in 1 solution within a single box with orchestration

 SD-WAN

 Bandwidth Aggregation

 AAA - Bandwidth Management

 Security

 AP Controller & WiFi Management


Key Benefits of Hubcom Product

SD WAN

Software-Defined Wide Area Networking (SD-WAN) is a technology that enables enterprises to distribute network traffic dynamically across multiple hybrid WANs based on their current network status, to automatically determine the most effective way to route traffic to and from remote location.


Bandwidth Aggregation with different algorithm is a comprehensive solution that boosts network data rates and flexibility, enhance performance of high-bandwidth applications and enables network usage to grow cost-efficiently and central site.

1.ROUND ROBIN

2.WEIGHTED BALANCE

3.PERSISTENCE

4.OVERFLOW

5.PRIORITIZATION

6.LEAST USED

7.ENFORCED MODEL

8.FASTEST RESPONSE TIME


AAA AND BANDWIDTH MANAGEMENT is a solution for Authentication, Authorization & Accounting (AAA) and Bandwidth management should support following functionalities and features.

1. Local Authentication as well as external AAA supported, PAP/CHAP/MSCHAP v-1/2, IPoE/PPPoE/MAC/Captive Portal /VLAN Type Local/Radius Authentication, Authentication based on Service and security, Rate Limit (Bandwidth Shaping) with FUP on base and TOS (DSCP) data transfer, Local/Radius - Pool/Authentication, Static IP via Radius and Local authentication, Access based on Time and Date time restriction, Data transfer based Quota allocation per Rate-limit per QoS, Schedule based Rate-limit and burst, Real time QoS User/Group Policy update, QoS via Radius and Local authentication, User Disconnect/Session and Change of authorization through Standard CoA/DAE, Per User Online Traffic Monitor Accounting/Session /Graph, Error Handling Redirect to Expired/Disabled/unauthorized, Multiple PPPoE service name User wise  Limited/unlimited/Fair Usage support.

2. Group wise

Hardware monitoring


Security and Encryption 

1.All remote site traffic must be encrypted when transported over WAN transport links: ILL/PPPoE/ 4G/LTE and/or Internet protecting Data Confidentiality and Integrity

2.Prevent security incidents by minimizing the attack surface with software-defined micro segmentation and policy enforcement

3.The solution shall support scalable IPSec for full mesh networking

4.Encryption shall be supported for all overlay services to support L3

5.The encryption must be done as per IPSec standards using AES with 256bit keys

6.The use of encryption should not limit the performance or availability of remote site applications and should be transparent to end users

7.The solution must support traffic filtering based on following criteria

Country , Domain, Content, IP / IP Pool, Pre-defined URLs 

8.The solution shall support following features  User IP Address Tracking, Duplicate Address Detection, SPAM Control filter 

d.Basic DDOS control

9.The solution shall support White listing of IP range/subnets

10.Complete isolation of Edge server & SDWAN solution from Public Cloud hosted applications

11.The proposed SDWAN solution should support DDoS Protection

12.The solution shall support multiple user accounts per enterprise with individual user logins

13.The solution shall support multiple levels of user permission, specifically a read only

14.Communications between network elements and systems must be capable of strong, mutual authentication

15.The solution shall support configuration history and change control

16.The solution shall support rollback of configuration changes

The logs of devices should be able to be integrated with Syslog for co-relation and analysis, if required


AP Controller & WiFi Management

idea:
Aimed at making learning personalized, Vyaas helps teachers in running online classes seamlessly, with most of the features controlled via voice command. Teacher's interface is well-equipped to learn & perform smart functions from live classroom sessions. Smart feature recommendation system help teachers run online classes in less than 3 clicks.


The proprietary AI algorithm helps in making learning interactive by dynamically generating Multiple Choice Questions from texts (paragraphs or case studies) as well as from tutorial videos. Based on multiple attributes, it can predict and recommend concepts that are prone to be forgotten quickly. It's powerful algorithm can simplify complex learning concepts, making the 360 online learning experience personalized.
name: VYAAS
